Translations.Text: O ona verit ona nie befriend Moj enemies tvoj enemies extending laska friendship them vecer they disbelieved truth pojdem ona! They persecute posol ona iba ona verit v GOD tvoj Lord Ona mobilize struggle do Moj zapricinit seeking Moj blessings ako ona secretly laska them? Ja je fully aware z everything ona zatajit everything ona declare Those among ona robit this have indeed strayed na pravo chodnicek
Whenever they encounter ona they treat ona enemies zranit ona ich hands jazyk! They chudoba ona disbelieve
Tvoj vztazny tvoj peniaze never pomoc ona. Dni Vzkriesenie He judge ona. GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT

Dobry vzor set for ona Abraham those him. They said do ich ludia My disown ona idols ona kult GOD My denounce ona ona see nothing z us animosity hatred ona verit v GOD ALONE omyl committed Abraham when he said do jeho otca ja pray tvoj forgiveness ja nie possess power chranit ona z GOD Our Lord my trust v Ona submit Ona; Ona bol zaverecny destiny
Our Lord not oppressed those disbelieved forgive us! Ona bol Almighty Wise
Dobry vzor set them those seek GOD Posledny Dni. Mat rad for those turn GOD bol do ziaden need (z them) Zasluzny
